channel.title: Boston Women in Bioinformatics's Events
channel.description: Stay updated with our upcoming events and meetups

item.title: Career Possibilities Panel & Speed Networking - Legal including General Counsel, Patents, and Intellectual Property
item.content:encoded:
When: Thursday, January 29, 2026 at 11:00 PM

Where: Zoom

As the STEM landscape continues to evolve, professionals are increasingly embracing non-linear career paths that reflect their expanding skills, interests, and goals. This series is designed to support STEM professionals navigating career shifts‚Äîwhether exploring new sectors, pursuing leadership roles, or transitioning into emerging fields.

The panel will have an informational interview type feel with panelists sharing their career paths, a look at what their job entails, and transferable skills for those looking to make a change.

Panelists to Include:

  • Thanh Erion - Senior Counsel, Intellectual Property at AbbVie
  • Angelyn Larkin - Patent Attorney at Lando & Anastasi, LLP
  • Vidya Subramanian - General Counsel at Souffle

Agenda:

  • 4 mins: Welcome
  • 60 mins: Panel discussion
  • 12 mins: Small-group speed networking
  • 2 mins: Learnings
  • 12 mins: Small-group speed networking

item.title: Byte and Bite: Bioinformatics Lunch Meetup
item.content:encoded:
When: Friday, February 13, 2026 at 5:00 PM

Where: CanalSide Food & Drink, CambridgeSide, 100 Cambridgeside Pl, Cambridge, Massachusetts

Celebrate Galentine's Day with your fellow bioinformatics besties! Whether you're already part of our community or looking to make new connections, join us for a relaxed lunch where women and all gender minorities can meet, mingle, and share ideas over good food and great conversation. Treat yourself to an afternoon of professional networking wrapped in Galentine's Day spirit!

What to Know Before You Register

  • This gathering is intended for individuals who identify as women. üë©‚Äçüî¨
  • Each guest will be responsible for purchasing their own meal and/or beverages. üçΩÔ∏è

How to find us

We‚Äôll be gathering at the CambridgeSide Mall food court, a lively and accessible spot right in the heart of East Cambridge. If you're taking the MBTA Green Line, hop off at Lechmere Station‚Äîit‚Äôs just a short walk to the mall entrance. Driving in? The mall offers plenty of garage parking with flexible hourly rates and extended hours, so you‚Äôll have no trouble finding a spot.

‚ÄãOnce inside, head toward Chilacates‚Äîwe‚Äôll be nearby! The food court features a variety of dining options, so feel free to grab a bite, explore, and settle in.
